item.description:
In keeping with Jon's quest for fitness and culture, the Natives invite you to participate in the 27th Annual James Joyce Ramble on Sunday, April 25 at the Endicott Estate.

This is a competitive 10K run through the streets of Dedham at 11 am followed by a 3.4 mile "Take a Walk" raising funds for the Dana Farber Cancer Institute.

Choose to Run or Walk, either way expect to encounter many folks reading along the race route. Several of us are doing the Walk. Multiple sponsors will be providing entertainment, food and fluids (including Harpoon) before and after the race.

Register on-line in advance or at the race between 8:30 am and 10:45 am. Cost is $25.00 - $30.00

For more information and to register go to ramble.org or or For Take a Walk go to www.dedhamsavingsbank.com
item.name: The 27th Annual James Joyce Ramble
